briefTitle: Evaluation of a Mindfulness Intervention to Prevent Chemo-brain in Women Preparing for Chemotherapy for Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Pilot Feasibility Evaluation of a Mindfulness (Mindfulness) Intervention in Women Preparing for Chemotherapy for Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* 18 years or older
* Breast cancer diagnosis preparing to undergo chemotherapy

Exclusion Criteria:

* Under the age of 18
* Cannot provide informed consent
